title: Understanding Our Git Workflow
summary: Learn how we manage code changes and collaborate using Git branching strategies
keyTakeaways: We use feature branches for all new work
Pull requests require at least 2 reviewers
Main branch is protected and auto-deployed

quiz.question: How many reviewers are required for a pull request?

explainLikeIm5: Think of Git like a shared notebook. Everyone writes on their own pages (branches), then asks friends to check their work (pull requests) before adding it to the main story (main branch).

title: Our Design System Principles
summary: Key principles behind our design system and how to use components effectively
keyTakeaways: Consistency is key - always use existing components first
Follow the 8px grid system for spacing
Colors have semantic meaning - use design tokens

quiz.question: What grid system do we use for spacing?

explainLikeIm5: Imagine building with LEGO blocks. Our design system gives you pre-made blocks (components) that fit together perfectly. You don't need to create new blocks - just use the ones we have!

title: Security Best Practices
summary: Essential security practices every team member should follow
keyTakeaways: Never commit API keys or secrets to code
Keep dependencies updated and scan for vulnerabilities

quiz.question: What should you do with API keys in your code?

explainLikeIm5: Security is like protecting your house. You wouldn't leave your keys lying around or give copies to strangers. Same with code - keep secrets safe and doors locked!
